name: Strategic Disruption of Power Centers
description: High-level methodologies for sabotaging IDC command structures and dismantling their operations.

cards.title: Identifying Structural Weaknesses in IDC Networks
cards.description: Analyzing and exploiting hidden fractures within IDC-controlled institutions.
bulletpoints: Mapping out internal power struggles and conflicts.
Leveraging factional divisions to create controlled chaos.
Targeting communication weak points to disrupt coordination.
cards.summaryText: Map faction fractures, exploit divisions, and sever comms to destabilize IDC networks.

cards.title: Sabotaging Hierarchical Command Chains
cards.description: Techniques for systematically eroding an IDC organization’s chain of command.
bulletpoints: Manipulating internal politics to create dissent.
Disrupting leadership trust through fabricated intelligence leaks.
cards.summaryText: Stir internal politics, leak crafted intel, and engineer controlled collapses in chains of command.

cards.title: Neutralizing Key Operatives Without Direct Confrontation
cards.description: Methods to remove or neutralize high-value targets without risk of exposure.
bulletpoints: Using counter-intelligence to expose their vulnerabilities.
Deploying reputational attacks to erode public and internal trust.
Strategic misdirection to push adversaries into self-destruction.
cards.summaryText: Expose weaknesses, erode reputations, and misdirect key operatives into self-neutralization.
